title: Telecom Subscription
description: Contain details for the specific subscription types, such as internet, mobile, media, or landline.

subscriptionSKU.title: Subscription SKU
subscriptionSKU.description: Stock keeping unit (SKU), a generally unique identifier for a product.

planName.title: Plan name
planName.description: The human readable name for the subscription.

type.title: Type
type.description: The scope of entitlement in relation to how many people are covered by the subscription.

country.title: Country
country.description: The country that the subscription contractual and agreement terms are rooted in.

endDate.title: End date
endDate.description: The date the current subscription term ends.

term.title: Term
term.description: The numeric value of the term.

termUnitOfTime.title: Term unit of time
termUnitOfTime.description: The unit of time for the term period.

renew.title: Renew
renew.description: The agreed way that the subscription may continue after the end date.

topUp.title: Top up
topUp.description: Agreed terms for how consumable aspects of a subscription are repurchased during a billing period.

status.title: Status
status.description: The current status of the subscription.

contractID.title: Contract ID
contractID.description: Unique ID for the contract that governs this subscription.

paymentMethod.title: Payment method
paymentMethod.description: The payment method for recurring payments.

billingStartDate.title: Billing start date
billingStartDate.description: The date when the billing period begins.

paymentDueDate.title: Payment Due Date
paymentDueDate.description: The date when the subscription payment is due.

chargeMethod.title: Charge method
chargeMethod.description: The way the billing is setup to charge the customer.

subscriptionCategory.title: Subscription Category
subscriptionCategory.description: The main, top level categorization of this type of subscription.

subscriptionSubCategory.title: Subscription Sub-category
subscriptionSubCategory.description: The specific sub categorization of the subscription.

devices.title: Devices
devices.description: Array of devices and/or accessories associated with the plan.

ID.title: Identifier
ID.description: Unique identifier for the subscription instance.
